content.text: We are excited to connect with you!
content.html: We are excited to connect with you!

content.text: Fill out the form below & we will be in touch with you within 2 business days! If you're looking to book an appointment, click here.
content.html: Fill out the form below & we will be in touch with you within 2 business days! If you're looking to book an appointment, click here.

content.text: Thank you!We'll be in touch soon!
content.html:
Thank you!

We'll be in touch soon!

content.text: Preparing for your visit to Bridal Aisle
content.html: Preparing for your visit to Bridal Aisle

content.text: We’re a shoe-free boutique to keep our gowns pristine
content.html: We’re a shoe-free boutique to keep our gowns pristine

content.text: To protect our dresses from Minnesota’s unpredictable weather, we kindly ask all guests to remove their shoes upon arrival. We’ll provide slippers for you to wear during your appointment, or you may bring your own.
content.html: To protect our dresses from Minnesota’s unpredictable weather, we kindly ask all guests to remove their shoes upon arrival. We’ll provide slippers for you to wear during your appointment, or you may bring your own.

content.text: A smaller guest list makes for a more meaningful moment
content.html: A smaller guest list makes for a more meaningful moment

content.text: Finding your dress is a once-in-a-lifetime moment, and bringing just one or two trusted guests allows you to truly focus on what you love. For groups larger than four, please contact us to book a private appointment for a more comfortable experience.
content.html: Finding your dress is a once-in-a-lifetime moment, and bringing just one or two trusted guests allows you to truly focus on what you love. For groups larger than four, please contact us to book a private appointment for a more comfortable experience.

content.text: Arriving on time ensures you get the full experience
content.html: Arriving on time ensures you get the full experience

content.text: We encourage brides to arrive on time, or a few minutes early, so we can provide the attentive and relaxed experience every appointment deserves. If you anticipate being late, please let us know so we can accommodate you with care.
content.html: We encourage brides to arrive on time, or a few minutes early, so we can provide the attentive and relaxed experience every appointment deserves. If you anticipate being late, please let us know so we can accommodate you with care.

content.text: The earlier you shop, the easier your alterations will be
content.html: The earlier you shop, the easier your alterations will be

content.text: Your perfect dress deserves the perfect fit. Shopping well in advance of your wedding date ensures you have time for any necessary alterations. If you don’t have an alteration specialist, our team would love to recommend one.
content.html: Your perfect dress deserves the perfect fit. Shopping well in advance of your wedding date ensures you have time for any necessary alterations. If you don’t have an alteration specialist, our team would love to recommend one.

content.text: The right undergarments make all the difference
content.html: The right undergarments make all the difference

content.text: Your undergarments create the foundation for your overall look. We recommend nude, seamless pieces and a strapless or convertible bra — or even going braless if you feel comfortable. Most gowns include built-in cups, so skipping a bra often gives you the most accurate fit and feel.
content.html: Your undergarments create the foundation for your overall look. We recommend nude, seamless pieces and a strapless or convertible bra — or even going braless if you feel comfortable. Most gowns include built-in cups, so skipping a bra often gives you the most accurate fit and feel.

content.text: If you need to cancel, please let us know in advance
content.html: If you need to cancel, please let us know in advance

content.text: We require a minimum of 24 hours’ notice to receive a refund of your $25 deposit. Arriving more than 20 minutes late without notice will result in cancellation. The deposit is non-refundable if you do not cancel in advance or if you do not find your gown during your visit.
content.html: We require a minimum of 24 hours’ notice to receive a refund of your $25 deposit. Arriving more than 20 minutes late without notice will result in cancellation. The deposit is non-refundable if you do not cancel in advance or if you do not find your gown during your visit.

content.text: To maintain the beauty and cleanliness of our gowns and boutique, we kindly ask that no food or beverages are brought into the store. Clear liquids and champagne are welcome; however, we ask that champagne be opened outdoors or in the restroom area. All other beverages may be left in the front waiting area.
content.html: To maintain the beauty and cleanliness of our gowns and boutique, we kindly ask that no food or beverages are brought into the store. Clear liquids and champagne are welcome; however, we ask that champagne be opened outdoors or in the restroom area. All other beverages may be left in the front waiting area.

content.text: We kindly ask that appointments remain adult-only
content.html: We kindly ask that appointments remain adult-only

content.text: We adore children, but to ensure a calm and focused experience for every bride, we ask that appointments remain adult-only. This allows us to give you—and every guest in the boutique—the pampered attention you deserve.
content.html: We adore children, but to ensure a calm and focused experience for every bride, we ask that appointments remain adult-only. This allows us to give you—and every guest in the boutique—the pampered attention you deserve.
